pullRequest.title: [mqtt][HA] ConcurrentHashMap to avoid ConcurrentModificationException
pullRequest.bodyText:
Hi @jochen314!
I've been able to fix the ConcurrentModifiedException errors using a ConcurrentHashMap for the 'results' of the discovery process.
What do you think?
Sadly the problem described in #7716 (comment) is still present 😞
Fixes #7661
Signed-off-by: Aitor Iturrioz riturrioz@gmail.com
